document.full_text: a u.s. drone missile strike on thursday killed at least 38 suspected militants in a pakistani tribal region known as a haven for taliban and al qaeda fighters, pakistani intelligence officials said.
document.title: suspected u.s. drone strike in pakistan, 38 killed
lines_and_colors: a u.s. drone missile strike on thursday killed at least 38 suspected militants in a pakistani tribal region known as a haven for taliban and al qaeda fighters, pakistani intelligence officials said.
